roshan manoj kumara namathi me withthikaru athadanguwata ganimata ese wiwrutha warenthu nikuth keruni.1999 agosthu masa 08 ho eeta aasanna dinaka di eeriyawatiye di danata miyagos sitina hettiaarachchige warnasiri namaththa samanga ekwa ihalage anura indika namaththa wedi thaba ghathanaya kala bawata withthikaruta erehiwa nithipathiwaraya wisin adhi chodana gonu kara thibuni.withthikaruta erehiwa adhi chodana paminilla wisin sadharana sakayen thorawa oppu kara athi bawa thindu kala winisuruwaraya withthikaruta maraniya dandanaya niyama keleya..

paudgalikawama mage awadhanayata lak wu yam yam da thamayi, mathruka wachana harambaa, chayarupa, paliya aadiyen athurukatha idiripath kirime obe hakiyawa, ashlila yayi sammatha bhasha bhawithayen walakima (puka wage sarala dewal nemeyi), koment sambandhayen kopa nowima, thamage guna wayana aya, mithuranwa, kondesi wirahithawa sadharanikaranaya nokirima, paudgalika de gana nowa liya athi de gana srujuwa kathakirima, waranayata akamathi wuwath, thunweni parshawa gana sitha koment modaret kirimata gath thiranaya, apahasaya saha upahasaya athara wenasa hondin handunagena thibima yana dewal.
